original: kartṛtvasāmānyapariṇāmamapi purodhāya dhūrtabrūvasvasvīkaraṇamaśaraṇamārabdhamevaṃ yadyadā yatkaraṇasamarthavyavahārābhyaṅgastaṃ tattadā tatkarotyeva  #

original: kāritvānakṣepakāritvalakṣaṇajananajanitaṃ tatsamarthavyavahārayogyatvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyañcātra karotyapi karotyeveti vā kartṛtvadvayaṃ paryāyato  #

original: ṇagaṇasya yadyatkaraṇasamarthavyavaharaṇakāraṇatvābharaṇasya tamupalabdhaṃ tattadākaraṇavat yathāntyāyāṃ daśāyāṃ prākpṛthagavasthāyāmapi bījamajātajaratvamanu(2)  #

original: kevalā avyāhataparasparāntarānupradeśāḥ kathamāvaraṇatvāt jātasya vātra ucyate /

original: na hyaghaṭo nāstītyeva ghaṭārthī pravartate api ghaṭo 'stītyādiḥ yato 'ghaṭo nāstītyanyanivṛttirghaṭo vāstīti aghaṭādanyā ihāstīti aghaṭalakṣaṇā-(4)

ni a vyāvṛttaḥ iti ekaḥ eva arthaḥ

original: ghaṭākāraghaṭitaghoṣonmīṣitamanīṣāyā eva ghaṭaviśeṣe apratiṣṭhitāyāḥ aghaṭavyāvṛttaghaṭe pravṛttinimittatvena nirūpaṇāt /

tṛtīya prakāra abhāvam ca sūcayati iti eka pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ eṣaḥ

original: tena aghaṭasyaiva nivṛttiriti pratītau nāyaṃ doṣa iti cet,
analyzed: tena aghaṭasya eva nivṛttiḥ iti pratītau na ayam doṣaḥ iti ced
tad prakṣepe tu kaḥ tatas nyaḥ vidhiḥ
niṣedha pratikṣepasya eva vidhi tvāt iti vivakṣitam evā udyotitam
yatas ghaṭa sārūpya sphuraṇāt evam tad itara nirākaraṇam

original: tadanupalambharūpatvā diti kathitamevaṃ prathamaṃ bādhakapratyayāduttarasamayasambhavinaḥ punastadalīkatvakalpanamekeṣām /
analyzed: tad anupalambha rūpa tvāt iti kathitam evam prathamam bādhaka pratyayāt uttara samaya sambhavinaḥ punar tad alīka tva kalpanam ekeṣām
yat punar ucyate svarūpa bhedaḥ

original: vānyāpoho 'nyāpoḍharūpatvādvidhiriti cet na alauṃkapakṣe tadabhāvāt tasya svarūpavidhānavalīkatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: vā anya apohaḥ rūpa tvāt vidhiḥ iti ced na alauṃka pakṣe tad abhāvāt tasya svarūpa vidhāna valīka tva prasaṅgāt
sva lakṣaṇasya vikalpa anarohāt iti tat api etena

original: ghaṭasārūpyasphuraṇenāghaṭanivṛttasthūlamūlavastuvidhiravibhūta eva buddhayāpyavasīyate tadūrdhvaṃ dhvaṃsate bādhakāditi ko 'parādhaḥ prathamabodhasya
analyzed: ghaṭa sārūpya sphuraṇena aghaṭa nivṛtta sthūla mūla vastu vidhiḥ avibhūtaḥ eva buddhayā api avasīyate tad ūrdhvam dhvaṃsate bādhakāt iti kaḥ parādhaḥ prathama bodhasya

original: ca idamudīryate tvayā vikalpe svalakṣaṇānārohāditi na saṅgataṃ sajātīyavijātīṃyavyāvṛttapratiṣṭhitaghaṭākārapaṭu pratyakṣāpekṣayā vastu svalakṣaṇamucyate
analyzed: ca idam udīryate tvayā vikalpe sva lakṣaṇa anārohāt iti na saṅgatam sajātīya vijātīṃya vyāvṛtta pratiṣṭhita ghaṭa ākāra paṭu pratyakṣa apekṣayā vastu sva lakṣaṇam ucyate
tat eva vastu vijātīya tva āvṛttam ullikhatā vikalpena samārūpya vaśāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam adhyavasāyam
vikalpam iti ucyate tat api sthūla mūla svarūpa sparśa ādi atirikta jāti ādi padārtha anupalambhāt

iti artham abhisaṃdhāya vikalpe sva lakṣaṇam etat vyāvṛttam ābhāti iti ucyate

original: na tu bhāvābhāvātmakatvādubhayasādhāraṇaḥ śeṣamapi kalpanaṃ aphalamanyathaiva vivakṣitatvāt /

original: sarvasyaiva hi dharmarūpasya śābdasya tādṛśadharmmadvaye dṛṣṭatvāt /

āvirbhāva tirobhāva dharmmakeṣu anuyāyi vat
tad dharmmi

iti bhaṭṭa matam

iti siddhāntatatvam ācāryīyam ādau eva likhitam
śabdebhyaḥ yādṛśī buddhiḥ naṣṭe naṣṭe api dṛśyate

śrotra ādi vipakṣa dharmiṇi tatas ca ayam prayogaḥ prajāyate

original: yaḥ pratyayo yasyārthasya bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇapratibhāsaḥ sa paramārthatastadviṣayo na bhavati /

yaḥ paramārthataḥ
pratyayaḥ yad viṣayaḥ sa tasya arthasya anvaya vyatirekau anuvidhatte

śarkarā lakṣaṇa svārtha bhāva abhāvā

original: nuvidhāyī ca na bhavati śarkarāvikalasya pratibhāsaḥ paramārthatastadviṣayatvaṃ tadutpattisambadhanibaṃdhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotraprarūpa pratyayapratibhāso  #

paramārthataḥ tad viṣaya tvam syāt

original: canopanaddhaṃ paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇāt sāṃvṛtaṃ na pāryate /

hā viṣayaḥ prakāśyate

original: anyat saṃvṛtisat proktaṃ te svasāmānyalakṣaṇe / ityarthaḥ /

original: grāhakajñānāpekṣayā prasaṅge datte ke [6] śe spṛṣṭa śiraśca nayasi sāmagryā vaicitryāditi tataḥ ki jñānameva sakalopādhi upakārayogyavastusvarūpamanyonyāpekṣaṃ  #
analyzed: grāhaka jñāna apekṣayā prasaṅge datte ke spṛṣṭa śiraḥ ca nayasi sāmagryāḥ vaicitryāt iti tatas ki jñānam eva sakala upādhi upakāra yogya vastu svarūpam anyonya apekṣam

original: svabhāva eṣa jñānasya kṛtastena tatpadārthamekopādhiviśiṣṭaṃ niṣṭaṃkayati /

original: etena bhedāddharmiṇaḥ pratītāvapi śabdaliṅgadvārā dharmāṇāṃ bhedapratītirindriya dvārāpi mā bhūta ityādikaṃ tu karṇasparśeṃ kaṭicālanamapāstam

original: indriyasya tu arthaśaktera pekṣaṇāt na tu sambaddho 'rtha ityevaṃ pramāṇaiḥ pramāpyate,

original: api ca tadasyaparihāreṇa pravartateti ca dhvaneḥ ucyate /

original: kṣiptatvādupādhicakrasya na śakyaṃ śakrasyāpi taddvāreṇa saṃdigdhānaikāntikatvaṃ kīrtayitum /
analyzed: kṣipta tvāt upādhi cakrasya na śakyam śakrasya api tad dvāreṇa saṃdigdha anaikāntika tvam kīrtayitum
jñānam indriya bhedena paṭu manda āvila ādikām
pratibhāsa bhidām arthe vibhrat ekatra dṛśyate
arthasya abhinna rūpa tvāt eka rūpam bhavet manaḥ
tad artham arthāt ced tasya nā asti tad ābha tā
artha āśrayeṇa udbhavataḥ tad rūpam an akurvataḥ
tasya kecid aṃśena paratas bhidā bhavet

original: tadā hyāśritya pitaraṃ tadrūpo 'pi sutaḥ pituḥ /
analyzed: tadā hi āśritya pitaram tad rūpaḥ pi sutaḥ pituḥ
bhedam kenacid aṃśena kutaścid avalambate
mayūra candraka ākāram nīlalohita bhāsvaram
sampaśyanti pradīpa ādeḥ maṇḍalam manda cakṣuṣaḥ
tasya tad vāhya rūpa tve kā prasanna īkṣaṇe kṣamā
bhūtam paśyan ca tad darśī katham ca upahata indriyaḥ
śodhitam timireṇa asya vyaktam cakṣuḥ atīndriyam
paśyataḥ nyākṣa dṛśye rthe tat avyaktam katham punar
āloka akṣa manaskārāt anyasya ekasya gamyate
śaktiḥ hetuḥ tatas nā anyaḥ hetuḥ ca viṣayaḥ katham
iti anyasya upādhi grahasya ca ananvaya vyatireka adhyāsāt

original: tatkathaṃ taddvāreṇāpi pratibhāsabhedo bhāvīti dharmādupādhīnāmativi jñānasadbhāvāt /
analyzed: tat katham tad dvāreṇa api pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhāvi iti dharmāt upādhīnām ati vi jñāna sadbhāvāt
vastu dharma tayā eva arthāḥ tādṛś vijñāna kāraṇam
bhede yatra tat jñānam tān tathā pratipadyate
jñānāni api tathā bhede bheda pratyavamarśane
iti a tad krārya viśleṣasya anvayaḥ na eka vastunaḥ

original: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ /
analyzed: vastūnām vidyate tasmāt tad niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
bāhya śakti vyavaccheda niṣṭha bhāve
vikalpa pratibimbeṣu tad niṣṭheṣu nibadhyate
tatas nyā apoha niṣṭha tvāt uktā anya apoha kṛt śrutiḥ

original: 'bāhyaśakti' ityādi ślokapūrvvabhāgaḥ pramāṇasya bādhakasya sūtra [3] kaḥ,
analyzed: bāhya śakti ityādi śloka pūrvva bhāgaḥ pramāṇasya bādhakasya sūtra kaḥ

original: 'vikalpa pratibimbeṣvityādi prakāśya dṛśyavikalpāvartho ekīkṛtya vyavahārapravṛtterityevamarthaḥ saṃketādikāraṇasya /
analyzed: vikalpa pratibimbeṣu ityādi prakāśya dṛśya vikalpau arthau ekīkṛtya vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ iti evam arthaḥ saṃketa ādi kāraṇasya
vyatireki iva yat jñāne bhāti artham pratibimbakam
śabdāt tat api na artha ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā udbhavā
tasya abhi dhāne śrutibhiḥ artha ikaḥ śaḥ vagamyate
tasya āgatau ca saṅketa kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
śabdaḥ kam āha iti tatra anya apohaḥ

original: ākāraḥ sa ca nārthe 'sti taṃ vadannarthabhāka katham /
analyzed: ākāraḥ sa ca nā arthe sti tam vadan artha bhāka katham
śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
ananvayī dhiyaḥ bhedāt darśana abhyāsa nirmitaḥ
tad rūpa āropa gatya anyathā vṛtta adhigateḥ punar

original: śabdārtho 'rthaḥ sa eveti vacana na virudhyate //
analyzed: śabda arthaḥ rthaḥ saḥ eva iti vacana na virudhyate
iti bādhaka pratyaya vaśāt a tad rūpa vyāvṛtta virodhe kathyate

original: sa ca vidhi pratītyanantaraṃ vidhiguṇatvena pratibhāti /
analyzed: sa ca vidhi prati iti anantaram vidhi guṇa tvena pratibhāti
anbaya vyatirekābhyām loka vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ
yathā ca tat paricchinatti ityādi
kkacid niveśanāya arthe vinivartya kutaścana
buddheḥ prayujyate śabdaḥ tad arthasya avadhāraṇāt
vyarthaḥ nyathā prayogaḥ syāt tad jñeya ādi padeṣu api
vyavahāra upanīteṣu vyavacchedaḥ sti kaścana

original: nivaśanaṃ ca yo yasmāt bhidyate vinivartyatam /
analyzed: ca yaḥ yasmāt bhidyate
tad bhede bhidyamānānām samāna ākāra bhāsini
sa ca ayam anya vyāvṛtyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ

original: kaścit bhāga iti prokto rūpaṃ nāsyāpi kiñcana /

tad gatau eva śabdebhyaḥ gamyate
na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacid paraḥ
na ca api śabdaḥ dvaya kṛt anyaḥ iti asau
darśanam buddhi viplavaḥ
iti vyaktam uktam apohaḥ vyāvṛtti mātram uttara kālam śabda arthaḥ pratīyate
pratīyate iti sādhu eva uktam
mitra pādaiḥ
śabdaiḥ tāvat mukhyam ākhyāyāta
tatra apohaḥ tad guṇa tvena gamyaḥ
arthaḥ ca ekaḥ dhyāsataḥ bhāsataḥ nyaḥ
sthāpyaḥ vācyaḥ tattvataḥ nā eva kaścid
etāvati arthe vivakṣite sva vodha vaidhuryam bodhayan āha
varṇa kṛti akṣara ākāra
iti etāvati arthe vivakṣite sva bodha vaidhuryam bodhayan āha yat api atyanta vilakṣaṇānām ityādi

original: tadapi sandigdhānaikāntikamm vidhināpi tathābhūtena sālakṣaṇyavyavahārasya nirvāhāt tathāhi ayaṃ vyavahāro na nirnimittaḥ,
analyzed: tat api sandigdha anaikāntikam vidhinā api tathābhūtena sālakṣaṇya vyavahārasya nirvāhāt tathā hi ayam vyavahāraḥ na nirnimittaḥ
na api aneka nimittaḥ na api aneka asaṃsargi eka nimittaḥ atiprasaṅgāt
saṃsari eka nimittaḥ pariśiṣyate ityādi tat api
varṇa akṛt kṣara akāra śūnyam go tvam hi varṇyate
varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnya
sāmānyam

original: bahulābhisandhau dhautādhautamūlakasamānasatyatāvṛttāntapāmarasyāpi na lakṣyate ko hi viśeṣo 'bhāvo 'pohaḥ samastavarṇākṛtyakṣarākāraśūnyaṃ  #
analyzed: bahula abhisandhau dhauta adhauta mūlaka samāna satyatā vṛttānta pāmarasya api na lakṣyate kaḥ hi viśeṣaḥ samasta varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnyam
vā sāmānyam
pravṛtteḥ aśeṣāyāḥ aṅgam iti uktau

original: ko 'yamadhyavasāyaḥ kimalīkasya vastutayāvabhāsaḥ kiṃ cāvasthātmakatayā tato bhe(5)
analyzed: kaḥ yam adhyavasāyaḥ kim alīkasya vastu tayā avabhāsaḥ kim ca avasthā ātmaka tayā
vā vastu vāsanā samuttha tvam vā ityādi anabhimata mukhyaḥ prastuta bandha bandhu tā pratānaḥ

rtha avekīkṛtya vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ pramāṇa phala vyavasthā atra api pratyakṣa vat ityādi vacanāt nīla ākārāt viśiṣṭa tad viśeṣa grahaḥ
a tad rūpa parāvṛtta nīla ākārā tanmātra grahaṇam iti vyavasthā
yām ḥ na api viṣaya sārūpyam
tad abhāvān

original: kā hi paramārthasadalīkarūpayoḥ samāna rūpatā nāme tyādi guḍagorasayorekatākaraṇaṃ kvopayuktam /

ropya cintā kriyate śeṣaḥ ca doṣaḥ bhimānasya eva cintya tvāt ityādi rajata pratīti parāmarśāt gataḥ
yadi rajatam kim vācyam

original: ..........sādhakena vidheḥ pratyayāntareṇāstīti vā sthāpyo nāstīti bādhakena āśaṅkitasyāropitasya vā pratibaṃdho deśādipratiṣedhe prītiprasiddhameva
analyzed: sādhakena vidheḥ pratyaya antareṇa asti iti vā sthāpyaḥ na asti iti bādhakena āśaṅkitasya āropitasya vā pratibaṃdhaḥ deśa ādi pratiṣedhe prīti prasiddham eva

original: na tathā na yathā so 'sti tathāpi na ni[10]ṣidhyate //

original: yat tu jñānasārupyāt ka.....pravṛttiriti prastutya sphurita eva pravartayanīti tatsiddhameva sādhyate /
analyzed: yat tu jñāna sārupyāt ka pravṛttiḥ iti prastutya sphurite eva pravartayanī iti tat siddham eva sādhyate
yatas jñāna sārūpyam anumāna siddham iṣya te
sa ca avasthātum aparokṣa rūpa ajñāna antargatā api anumānena siddhā
ahaṃkāra āspada grāhaka ākāra parāmarśa antargata tvāt bāhya bhūtā sphurita śabda vācyā
sārūpyāt bhrāntitaḥ vṛttiḥ arthe ced syāt na sarvadā
deśa bhrāntiḥ ca na jñāne tulyam utpattitaḥ dhiyaḥ
tathā vidhāyāḥ
anyatra tatra anupagamāt dhiyaḥ
bāhi artha pratibhāsāyāḥ upāye vā apramāṇa tā
vasthā

original: ca nīlabhāvādeva ca tathokta tadrūparāvṛttiviṣayābuddhi svahetorālocyate prava........................śuktau
analyzed: ca nīla bhāvāt eva ca sva hetoḥ ālocyate
rajata śukti vat tena idam api nirdalitam

original: ā. ta. vi. 162-163- ḥtarhi sphurite svākāra eva pravartayatu tatra pravṛtta eva cārthī tatsadṛśamarthamāsādayati /
analyzed: ā te vi sphurite su ākāre eva pravartayatu tatra pravṛtte eva ca arthī tad sadṛśam artham āsādayati
maṇi prabhāyām pravṛttaḥ maṇi bat iti ced na
abhibhata artha kriyā sāmarthya virahiṇī apravṛtteḥ

ca ākāre bāhya tva āropaḥ svarūpe saṃsphurati
a svarūpa āropa anavakāśāt

original: prabhāyāṃ tu maṇi buddhayaivamaṇyarthī pravartate na tu taddhuddhayeti dṛṣṭānto 'pyābhāsaḥḥ ityāditarkatattvamabedayamānena bhaṇitam /
analyzed: prabhāyām tu maṇi buddhayā evam aṇi arthī pravartate na tu tad huddhayā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ pi ābhāsaḥ ityādi tarka tattvam abedayamānena bhaṇitam
maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ maṇi buddha yāmi dhāvatoḥ
mithyā jñāna aviśeṣe viśeṣaḥ ṛthakriyām prati
yathā tathā yathārtha tve pi anumāna tad ābhayoḥ
artha kriyā anurodhena pramāṇa tvam su vyavasthitam
grāhaka ākāra vikṣiptā nīlam eva etat iti sphurat
vikalpa bāhyam eva etat
nīla anya nīla nīla gocaraḥ jñānam ābhāti nīla ākāraḥ utyatteḥ ced
anumānāt hi dharmiṇi

original: ḥsamvedanaṃ ca yat rūpaṃ nahi tat tasya vedanamḥ vasthita na bhavatyetat /

original: tasmādvāhyasiddhiśca sākāraṃ ca jñānamiti bālaloluptva miti parihāsa paritārpi paratāpitahṛdayavyaktāvyaktādyutpattijñāne nīlamajñānaṃ na kriyopalakṣitasvarūpavyava-(9)

analyzed: hāra tvam upāyam iti tat nīlam anahaṃkāra kalitam ābhāsane meya bāhya tā bhāsate jñāna rūpa ākhyam anumāne na iti

yat punar uktam
atha kaḥ yamagauḥ nāma
kim ekasya go sva lakṣaṇa syān ātmā āhosvit tad gata dharma virahī

original: ādye vāhuleya eva maunaṃ śāvaleya syāt /
analyzed: ādye vāhuleye eva maunam śāvaleya syāt

original: dvitīye tu tadgata dharmavirahi vyāvṛttastadvānena syāt tatra ca no vivādaḥ ityādi kṛtopi sarvadā tadapohena............darśitaṃ syāt /

eka dhī hetu bhāvena vyaktīnām api abhinna tā

original: tasmāttvayi kurvatsarveṇeha maṇḍalamakhaṇḍasaṃtata sadā yena paśyati na bhūmiṃ asantaśca.....parimāṇavarṇākṛtyakṣarā (4)
analyzed: tasmāt tvayi kurvat sarveṇa iha maṇḍalam akhaṇḍa saṃtata sadā yena paśyati na bhūmim asantaḥ ca parimāṇa varṇa ākṛti akṣarā
eva pravṛtte maṇḍala kṛtam eka parāmarśam api a paśyan varṇa ākṛtyā a tad dharmma vyatiriktam avabudhyata

original: iti tathā syāt viśeṣamapi na yat na hi rupyate ekenaiva vyavahāro ityeva vyaktitve rūpamiti yadi (5)
analyzed: iti tathā syāt viśeṣam api na yat na hi rupyate ekena eva vyavahāraḥ iti eva vyakti tve rūpam iti yadi

original: syādekavyavahṛteḥ yato 'nyasmādekatvenānye yadyekatvena vyavahartṛ syāttarhi buddhivaikalyasajātīyavyāvṛttivirodhaḥ /

original: vyavahārayati yat yat etat anayā pratītaṃ tadeva tayaikatvenavyavahāryamiti sabalā pravuttiḥ /

pratyaya vibhāgam

varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnyam go tvam hi varṇyate

mukhya a viśiṣṭa vijñāna grāhya tvāt na aupacārikaḥ
ananya hetutā tulyā sā mukhya abhimata iṣvayi

original: sambandha bodhiśabdo vā tadvodho vāpi bodhayet /

a vyava
śabdaḥ prasthāpaka tve syāt na arthasya api tu saṃvidaḥ
sā tu sambandho
na abhidhānam paraḥ dharmaḥ pratīti karaṇāt janaiḥ

original: karaṇatve 'pi kāryālpā kriyā na dvaya niṣṭhatā /

utas tattvaiḥ tu svayam uccāraṇe tathā

ekam eva artham vijñānam jñānam
pratvāyakam kṛtaḥ
